doc:
Arthur Askey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Askey 0 Arthur Bowden Askey, CBE (6 June 1900 – 16 November 1982) was an English comedian and actor. Askey's humour owed much to the playfulness of the characters he portrayed, his improvisation, and his use of catchphrases, which included "Hello playmates!", "I thank you" (pronounced "Ay-Thang-Yaw"), and "Before your very eyes". Arthur_Bowden_Askey , CBE ( 6_June_1900 – 16_November_1982 ) was an_English_comedian_and_actor . Askey 's_humour owed much to the_playfulness of the_characters he portrayed , his_improvisation , and his_use of catchphrases , which included " Hello_playmates ! " , " I thank you " (_pronounced_"_Ay-Thang-Yaw_"_) , and " Before your_very_eyes " .
